metadata.name: Guaranteed Treasure Room Start (Auto Reseed)
metadata.description:
A small mod to reseed the initial stage of any non-challenge run until a treasure room is adjacent to the starting room.
[b]To Enable searching for Curse of the Labyrinth floors:[/b] 1. Go to ...\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ Mods\auto reseed\ 2. Open "main.lua" with any texteditor 3. In Line 6, change "local searchLabyrinth = false;" to "local searchLabyrinth = true;" 4. Save the file 5. Play the game
For all those lazy asses like me out there.
Thanks to HeyItsMcKay for creating the icon :-)
